code: client.print('kek i am watching you');module = script.registerModule('AutoSW',EXPLOITS);module.addIntegerProperty('d','Distance',3,3,10,1);module.addIntegerProperty('del','Delay',10,0,20,1);function glass(x_s,y_s,z_s) {return world.getBlockName(world.getBlockAtBlockPos(world.getBlockPos(x_s,y_s,z_s))) == 'tile.glass'};module.onEvent('enable',function(event){a = 0;});module.onEvent('playerPreUpdateEvent',function(event){var x = (Math.floor(player.x))+0.5;var y = player.y;var z = (Math.floor(player.z))+0.5;if((glass(x,y-0.1,z) || (glass(x+1,y,z) && glass(x,y,z+1) && glass(x-1,y,z) && glass(x,y,z-1))) && player.onGround) {a++;if(a > module.getProperty('del').getInteger()) {player.setPosition(player.x,player.y-module.getProperty('d').getInteger(),player.z);a = 0;};};});
